name: sd-material-ui
description: StratoDem Analytics Dash implementation of material-ui components

scripts.build-dist: builder run clean-lib && builder run extract-metadata && webpack --config=config/webpack.config.dist.js --display-error-details && npm run copy-lib
scripts.build-dist-production: builder run clean-lib && builder run extract-metadata && webpack -p --config=config/webpack.config.dist.js && npm run copy-lib
scripts.install-local: npm run copy-lib && python setup.py install
scripts.prepublish: npm test && builder run build-dist && npm run copy-lib
scripts.publish-all: npm publish && python setup.py sdist upload
scripts.publish-pypi: npm run prepublish && python setup.py sdist upload
